name: Clyde McGRIFF, Appellant v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS and Gateway Rehabilitation Center, Inc., Appellees

parties: Clyde McGRIFF, Appellant v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS and Gateway Rehabilitation Center, Inc., Appellees.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 12th day of June, 2008, the Application to Dismiss the Appeal as Moot is GRANTED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
954 A.2d 565
Clyde McGRIFF, Appellant v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS and Gateway Rehabilitation Center, Inc., Appellees.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
June 12, 2008.
